query: best pet friendly hotels in Tokyo
title: What are the best pet-friendly hotels in Tokyo
excerpt: Finding pet-friendly hotels in Tokyo can be a daunting task, as many accommodations do not welcome furry companions. This curated list highlights the best options, ensuring that you and your pet can enjoy a comfortable stay while exploring the vibrant city together. These hotels not only provide pet-friendly amenities but also offer unique experiences that cater to both you and your four-legged friend.
intro: Discover the top pet-friendly hotels in Tokyo where both you and your beloved pet can enjoy a delightful stay.

hotels.name: HOSHINOYA Tokyo
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled relaxation at HOSHINOYA Tokyo, where you can unwind in serene hot springs or stroll through beautiful gardens. Enjoy a culinary journey with exquisite dining options and 24-hour room service, alongside luxurious accommodations featuring modern amenities like deep soaking bathtubs and flat-screen TVs. Conveniently located near iconic attractions such as the Tokyo Imperial Palace, this hotel offers a perfect blend of tranquility and city life.
hotels.highlight: HOSHINOYA Tokyo provides pet-friendly accommodations, a serene garden, and 24-hour concierge service for a luxurious stay.

hotels.name: APA Hotel Roppongi Ekimae
hotels.description: APA Hotel Roppongi Ekimae boasts a prime location just a minute from Roppongi Subway Station, ensuring effortless access to the city's vibrant attractions. Guests can unwind in comfortably furnished rooms featuring original mattresses, free WiFi, and essential amenities. With services like free luggage storage and a 24-hour front desk, along with a selection of Western-style breakfast options, this hotel promises a seamless travel experience for every visitor.
hotels.highlight: APA Hotel Roppongi Ekimae provides pet-friendly accommodations along with free WiFi, a restaurant, and convenient access to public transport.

hotels.name: APA Hotel Shinjuku Gyoemmae
hotels.description: Experience modern comfort at APA Hotel Shinjuku Gyoenmae, where each room is designed for relaxation with original mattresses, flat-screen TVs, and private bathrooms stocked with free toiletries. Guests can take advantage of convenient amenities such as a refrigerator, hairdryer, and electric kettle, along with facilities like massage services, laundry, and a public bath to enhance their stay. With a dedicated 24-hour front desk and communal spaces, this hotel ensures a seamless and enjoyable experience in a prime location.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations alongside modern amenities like a hot tub and massage services for ultimate relaxation.

hotels.name: Hotel Rose Garden Shinjuku
hotels.description: Experience a harmonious blend of comfort and convenience at Hotel Rose Garden Shinjuku, located in the vibrant heart of Tokyo. Enjoy luxurious accommodations in elegantly designed rooms equipped with modern amenities, and savor exquisite Italian cuisine at our on-site restaurant or through room service. With prime access to iconic attractions like Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, your ideal Tokyo getaway awaits.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations with elegantly designed rooms and easy access to Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.

hotels.name: Hotel Gracery Shinjuku
hotels.description: Hotel Gracery Shinjuku combines comfort and convenience, situated just a short stroll from JR Shinjuku Station. Guests can indulge in a delightful breakfast buffet, while amenities like 24-hour reception and a multilingual concierge enhance their stay. A standout feature is the iconic Godzilla Head on the hotel terrace, making it an ideal base for exploring nearby attractions like Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Gracery Shinjuku offers pet-friendly accommodations, a stunning terrace, and a multilingual concierge service for enhanced convenience.

hotels.name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Tokyo-Hamamatsucho
hotels.description: Hotel Villa Fontaine Tokyo-Hamamatsucho offers a prime location just an 8-minute walk from JR Hamamatsucho Station, making it easy to explore Tokyo and reach Haneda Airport. Guests will enjoy comfortable rooms featuring modern amenities, including flat-screen TVs and Yukata robes, along with convenient services like free WiFi and on-site laundry facilities. Experience a blend of comfort and accessibility in the heart of Tokyo by booking your stay today.
hotels.highlight: Offers a pet-friendly policy with modern amenities, secure parking, and free WiFi in a central location.
